name: Wood Block Chop VR
description:
Wood Block Chop VR lets you use vr and your phone's gyroscope to split wood.

How much wood can you chop before the end of the day? Swing your phone and aim to get perfect cuts tp get double points.

This immersive vr environment puts you in a town when you have till the end of the day to cut as many logs as possible for the local blacksmiths.

Don't have a google cardboard? No sweat off a lumberjack back, This game works with without a vr head mounted display, allowing you to chop wood everywhere.
